Container.Name: mamapi
Container.Overview:
MAM API container for updating MyAnonamouse dynamic seedbox IP addresses automatically. This container monitors your VPN IP changes and updates MAM's API to ensure continuous connectivity with the tracker.
For features and detailed information, visit: https://github.com/elforkhead/mamapi
IMPORTANT: You must create a MAM session at https://www.myanonamouse.net/preferences/index.php?view=security with: 1. Locked session: ASN (NOT IP locked) 2. Dynamic seedbox: Yes 3. Copy the mam_id cookie when first created 4. Add additional ASNs as needed through MAM's 'Manage Session' menu
WARNING: Viewing the cookie again regenerates it!
For VPN users: Set Network type to "container" and Container network to "binhex-qbittorrentvpn"
Container.DonateText: If you appreciate this container, consider donating to the developer
Container.Description: Automatic MyAnonamouse dynamic seedbox IP updater for VPN users

Variable.Name: MAM_ID
Variable.Description: Your MAM session cookie (mam_id). Create in Security settings with ASN lock (not IP lock) and dynamic seedbox enabled. DO NOT include @IP format.

Variable.Name: DEBUG
Variable.Description: Enable debug logging (True/False). Not recommended for general use.

Variable.Name: WRITE_CURRENT_MAMID
Variable.Description: Write the current mam_id to a file in the data directory (True/False)

Variable.Name: SHUTDOWN_ON_DISCONNECT
Variable.Description: Exit container when internet connection is lost (True/False). Useful with restart policy.

Variable.Name: NOTIFY_URLS
Variable.Description: Apprise notification URLs (comma-separated) for error notifications
